trans-unit.target: TEXT_LUCKYB006_03662_PARALLELMINSTREL_000_002<tab>Yes, I thought so. <var 29 EB02 /var>, correct? You've been keeping very busy if all the rumors are to be believed.
TEXT_LUCKYB006_03662_PARALLELMINSTREL_000_003<tab>Hmm? Why are you staring at me with such intensity? Pray tell, have I said something to offend you?
TEXT_LUCKYB006_03662_A1_000_001<tab>How in the seven hells did you wind up in this world?
TEXT_LUCKYB006_03662_A1_000_002<tab><var 1A 02 /var>You<var 1A 01 /var> can cross the rift. You of all people...
TEXT_LUCKYB006_03662_PARALLELMINSTREL_000_005<tab>Judging by your cryptic comments I gather I bear a resemblance to someone you know? But I can assure you that we have never met before, you and I.
TEXT_LUCKYB006_03662_PARALLELMINSTREL_000_006<tab>Don't believe me? Then let us be friends. The more you learn about me, the more you will come to realize how different I am from this other “me.”

TEXT_LUCKYB006_03662_PARALLELMINSTREL_000_007<tab>I am a wanderer by trade, but a minstrel at heart. A keeper of tales, a singer of songs, a preserver of forgotten truths. Yet in defiance of my itinerant nature, I have elected to remain here for a time and compose new works.

TEXT_LUCKYB006_03662_PARALLELMINSTREL_000_008<tab>You being a traveling sinner, I'm sure you've seen your share of adventures. Such stories often serve as the best sort of inspiration. Perhaps I could persuade you to regale me with one or two?
